exceptions.exn: In environment k, n : nat f : nat -> nat H : forall i : nat, i < S n -> divides k (f i) IHn : (forall i : nat, i < n -> divides k (f i)) -> divides k (∑ n f) x : nat Hx : f n = x * k y : nat Hy : ∑ n f = y * k Unable to unify "(x + y) * k" with "f 0 + ∑ n (fun n : nat => f (S n))".

original: intros H. induction n as [|n IHn]. -- simpl. exists 0. reflexivity. -- simpl. destruct (H n (lt_n_Sn n)) as [x Hx]. destruct (IHn (fun i Hi => H i (le_S _ _ Hi))) as [y Hy]. exists (x + y). rewrite Nat.mul_add_distr_l, Hx, Hy. reflexivity.
